an5.115:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam niraye.
an5.115:1.3: Avasamaccharini hoti, kulamaccharini hoti, labhamaccharini hoti, vannamaccharini hoti, dhammamaccharini hoti.
an5.115:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam niraye.
an5.115:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam sagge.
an5.115:2.3: Na avasamaccharini hoti, na kulamaccharini hoti, na labhamaccharini hoti, na vannamaccharini hoti, na dhammamaccharini hoti.
an5.115:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam sagge”ti.
